description: Generate a WPA-PSK key from an ASCII passphrase for a SSID. More information: https://manned.org/wpa_passphrase.1.

useCases.description: Compute and display the WPA-PSK key for a given SSID reading the passphrase from stdin:
Compute and display WPA-PSK key for a given SSID specifying the passphrase as an argument:
